description: Create centralized design tokens file with Playful Geometric color palette (background: #FFFDF5, accent: #8B5CF6, secondary: #F472B6, tertiary: #FBBF24, quaternary: #34D399)
Configure Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, and border-radius tokens from design system
Import and configure Outfit font for headings and Plus Jakarta Sans for body text
Apply typography scale (1.25 ratio) across all headings with correct weights (700-800)
Update body background to warm cream (#FFFDF5) and text to slate-800 (#1E293B)
Implement hard shadow utility classes (4px 4px 0px, 6px 6px 0px, 8px 8px 0px) with no blur
Add bouncy transition timing function ease-[cubic-bezier(0.34,1.56,0.64,1)] for hover effects
Implement wiggle keyframe animation for icon hover states

Style featured/popular cards with pink hard shadow (#F472B6)
